attributes.action: Withdraw the proposal to award Salman Rushdie a knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Salman Rushdie makes no apolgies for disliking and insulting Great Britain and the Royal Family. He has done absolutely nothing for our country (Great Britain), apart from putting us under greater threat of random terorist attacks and endagering the already fragile relationships with major Eastern countries.  Mr Blair has stated his intention to try to build working relationships with Muslim countries, and I cannot see this as helping.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
